A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They went shtick comedy. Decided to turn Star Wars into  guardians of the galaxy. Kids liked it. I love Star Wars but went out of the theater frustrated and mad. Force awakens wasnt perfect but it did a fine tie in/introductions. Without stating spoilers I can just say not only is it my least favorite and despite watching all others regularly this one I don't see ever watching again. Maybe JJ can salvage the next one.
